name: sizer
description: Generate a report of the original, uglified, and gzipped sizes of a set of JavaScript files.

scripts.compile-src: npm run clean && babel --optional runtime src/ -d dist/src/ && babel index.es6 -d dist/
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run compile-src && babel -D test/ -d dist/test/
scripts.test: npm run compile && node --harmony ./node_modules/.bin/tape dist/test/helpers/globals.js dist/test/**/*.test.js
